Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size | Portable USB Memory Device

English.Char_Desc_45: A small and easy to use spreadsheet.
English.Char_Desc_80: The next generation in ultra modern,simple and easy to use,spreadsheet software
English.Char_Desc_250:
QT Calc Express is a very useful and small spreadsheet application for everyday use at home or for students and scholars needing something small, fast, and easy to use.
A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze.
English.Char_Desc_450:
QT Calc Express is a very useful and small spreadsheet application for everyday use at home or for students and scholars needing something small, fast, and easy to use.
This small yet powerful spreadsheet has all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, summarise, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics.
Use the chart wizard to select from eight or more categories of 2-D and 3-D charts.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
QT Calc Express is a very useful and small spreadsheet application for everyday use at home or for students and scholars needing something small, fast, and easy to use.
This small yet powerful spreadsheet has all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, summarise, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics.
A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze. Use the chart wizard to select from eight or more categories of 2-D and 3-D charts including line, area, column, pie, XY, stock and with dozens of variants.
Whether you are producing financial reports or managing personal expenses, QT Calc gives you more efficiency and flexibility to accomplish your goals.
With a few mouse-clicks, you can reorganize your spreadsheet to show or to format ranges according to special conditions, or to quickly calculate subtotals and totals.
QT Calc lets you present spreadsheet data in dynamic charts that update automatically when the data changes.
This application is also completely and absolutely portable!
If you experience any trouble running the "QTCalc.exe" executable file, simply run the "SSuiteQuickFix1.exe" setup file to fix it. [ Included in the zip file ]
Minimum System Requirements:
- 1024 x 600 display size - Runs on all Windows systems - 32 bit and 64 bit
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time...
